updated_cases.title:
Verify whether we are able to get Security Risk - 
1.Inline Policies->Categories
2.Settings->Bypass category
updated_cases.custom_summary:
Verify whether we are able to get Security Risk - Command & Control Server
Security Risk -Phising/Fraud,Security Risk-Spam Sites,Security Risk-Botnets
Security Risk-Compromised/malicious Sites,Security Riskcategories  in following places:
1.Inline Policies->Categories
2.Settings->Bypass category
updated_cases.custom_steps:
1.Login to Tenant WebUI
2.Under the Policies,Click on Inline 
3.Click on New Policy, Under the category tab verify Whehter we are getting  following Category
Security Risk - Command & Control Server
Security Risk -Phising/Fraud
Security Risk-Spam Sites
Security Risk-Botnets
Security Risk-Compromised/malicious Sites
Security Risk
3.Check the Category Name for both the urls
AND
1.Login to Tenant WebUI
2.Under the Settings ,Click on Active Platform
3.Click on Exception Configuration, Under the category tab verify Whehter we are getting following Category
Security Risk - Command & Control Server
Security Risk -Phising/Fraud
Security Risk-Spam Sites
Security Risk-Botnets
Security Risk-Compromised/malicious Sites
Security Risk
3.Check the Category Name for both the urls
updated_cases.custom_expected:
We should display Ad Fraud, Botnet,Command and Control Centers,Compromised & Links To Malware,Hacking  ,Malware Call-Home ,Malware Distribution Point ,Phishing/Fraud,Spam URLs ,Spyware & Questionable Software ,C&C Server ,Attack ,Phishing,Malicious Site ,Bot,Phish Site,Spam
 Categories in both the palces

updated_cases.title: Verify the URLLOOKUP Result for following Categories
updated_cases.custom_summary:
Verify the URLLOOKUP Result for following Categories
Security Risk - Command & Control Server
Security Risk -Phising/Fraud
Security Risk-Spam Sites
Security Risk-Botnets
Security Risk-Compromised/malicious Sites
Security Risk
updated_cases.custom_steps:
1.Login to Tenant WebUI
2.Under the Policies,Click on Inline 
3.Under the Web,click on URLLOOKUP and provide the following category url
Security Risk - Command & Control Server
Security Risk -Phising/Fraud
Security Risk-Spam Sites
Security Risk-Botnets
Security Risk-Compromised/malicious Sites
Security Risk
3.Check the Category Name for both the urls
updated_cases.custom_expected: We should get the proper category name here
